entry.title: RT Ethereum: The Infinite Garden: The merge is only hours away! We have film crews around the world, but we can't be everywhere at once, so we're aski...
entry.summary: RT Ethereum: The Infinite Garden The merge is only hours away! We have film crews around the world, but we can't be everywhere at once, so we're asking for your help documenting this historic moment. We'd love if you can record your live reactions and celebrations whether at a watch party or at home with coffee
